  • Welcome to EMOD-Generic

Welcome to EMOD-GenericÂ¶

EMOD-Generic is a collection of Python scripts and utilities created to streamline user interactions with the generic simtype of EMOD (current with the Generic-Ongoing branch), emod-api, and idmtools. It is similar to emodpy-generic but runs more substantial experiments on COmputational Modeling Platform Service (COMPS).

The workflow is a bit different from the one used in emodpy-generic. It still uses emod-api for file creation and idmtools to talk to COMPS, but the file creation is also done on COMPS (in contrast to emodpy-generic, which does file creation locally and then uploads everything to COMPS). This can be helpful if you have bandwidth issues.

Additional information about how to use idmtools can be found in Welcome to idmtools. Additional information about EMOD generic parameters can be found in EMOD parameter reference.

See Welcome to idmtools for a diagram showing how idmtools and each of the related packages are used in an end-to-end workflow using EMOD as the disease transmission model.
